modeldata.controllers: Controllers are an essential component of an OpenStack Cloud. We will deploy services such as Keystone, Horizon, Glance here.
modeldata.compute: Compute nodes is where your workload will eventually run. We will host services such as Nova on those machines. Make sure those machines have enough capacity.
modeldata.monitoring: SUSE OpenStack Cloud is an enterprise class solution, this is why we ship monitoring capabilities with our system to allow for Day 2 operations out of the box.
modeldata.storage: You can optionally add storage nodes to your deployment, and configure access to those nodes right from this panel.
